scripts.build: tsc; npm run minify-html; npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-js: for f in _site/**/*.js; do terser "$f" -c --source-map "content='$f.map',url='$(basename "$f.map")'" -o "$f"; done
scripts.dev: bundle exec jekyll build; npm run build; bundle exec jekyll serve --skip-initial-build --no-watch
